CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Project_Location__r.Location__c, "Dombivali"), IF( Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c > 150000, Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c - 150000, 0 ), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Project_Location__r.Location__c, "Mumbai"), ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Project_Location__r.Location__c, "South Mumbai") ), IF( Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c > 300000, Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c - 300000, 0 ), 0 ) )
CustomField.label: CEO Amount
